hero.subtitle: Innovative PVC and ALU solutions for the future of construction
hero.title: PVC and ALU profiles and systems
hero.description: Abi uses the latest technology for the production and processing of aluminum profiles. Our products are tailored to your specific needs, from idea to realization, providing excellent solutions for modern architecture and industry worldwide.

opening.title: Opening of new residential-commercial building
opening.description: ABI COMERC proudly announces the opening of a modern residential-commercial building in the heart of the city. The project combines excellent design, functionality and quality, offering apartments of various structures and modern business spaces adapted to the needs of today's market. On a special page you can explore building details, view floor plans, 3D animations and available apartments.

gallery.title: Products
gallery.description: Advanced aluminum systems for modern construction projects, offering durability, aesthetics and energy efficiency.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.description: We are proud of our long-term cooperation with numerous domestic and international partners. Together we build trust, quality and innovation, which allows us to realize projects at the highest level.

about.title: About Us
about.description: ABI COMERC d.o.o. Bužim is a family company specialized in the production and sale of PVC and ALU joinery. We provide complete solutions - from design and production to professional installation. With more than 15 years of experience, we build quality reputation and long-term relationships with clients and partners. Among other things, we also deal with the sale of construction materials.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide advanced aluminum and PVC systems that guarantee durability, energy efficiency and aesthetic value. We focus on innovation, quality workmanship and fast and reliable service.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We sell and produce durable and tested profiles.

efficiency.title: Energy Efficiency
efficiency.description: Solutions that save heating and cooling.

installation.title: Professional Installation
installation.description: Fast and precise installation by our team.

projects.title: New Projects and Investments
projects.description: We work on multiple projects simultaneously - from residential buildings to business facilities. The project page for the new building will contain detailed floor plans, 3D animations, gallery and list of available apartments.

cta.text: Want a quote or visit? Contact us.

building.title: Our New Business Building
building.description: Welcome to the page dedicated to the opening of our new building. This investment represents a step forward in the development of our company, enabling better working conditions and improving the production of PVC and ALU joinery.
building.details: The new building is equipped with modern equipment and modern premises so that we can provide even better quality services to our partners and clients. More information about the grand opening coming soon!

404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: Unfortunately, the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved. You can return to the home page or explore our services.
404.exploreText: Or you can explore our services:

underConstruction.title: Under Construction
underConstruction.description: This page is currently under development. We're working to provide you with the best experience.
underConstruction.note: The page will be available soon. Thank you for your patience!
underConstruction.contactDescription: Contact us if you have questions or need additional information.

windows.title: PVC and ALU Windows
windows.description: We use different systems adapted to the needs of the building: Harmo and US Nill for special requirements, while for windows and doors we use the highest quality PVC and aluminum profiles - Gealan S9000, S8000 IQ, HST, Smoovio, and aluminum systems Feal Termo 65 and Termo 85. These systems ensure excellent thermal and sound insulation, durability and modern design.

extra.description: Our windows and doors are available in different shapes and colors, with the possibility of additional insulation and security systems.

doors.title: Entrance Doors
doors.description: For special requirements we use Harmo and US Nill systems, while for entrance, balcony and sliding doors we apply reliable PVC and aluminum profiles - Gealan S9000, S8000 IQ, HST, Smoovio, and aluminum systems Feal Termo 65 and Termo 85. These systems guarantee security, stability and functionality, with modern appearance and excellent insulation.

extra.description: Facades that offer excellent aesthetics and energy efficiency.

garageDoors.title: Garage Doors
garageDoors.description: Our company manufactures custom garage doors in three variants: • Sectional doors - the most common choice for houses and residential buildings, providing excellent insulation and practical upward opening. • Industrial doors - designed for halls and larger buildings, extremely durable and adapted for frequent use. • Roller doors - compact solution that rolls up into a box above the opening, ideal when space is limited. All models are made of quality materials, providing security, durability and the possibility of adapting the design to your needs.

extra.description: Solutions that protect from the sun and improve space comfort.

sunProtection.title: Sun Protection
sunProtection.description: Our company produces various sun protection solutions: • Mosquito nets - reliable protection from insects, adapted to all types of windows. • Blinds - functional protection from sun and heat, available in different colors and materials. • External blinds (Raf Store) - modern system that provides light control, privacy and additional insulation. All products are made of quality materials, durable and adaptable to the needs of each building.

extra.description: Solutions that protect from the sun and improve space comfort.

stijenke.title: Partitions
stijenke.description: Our company produces quality partitions for spaces of all purposes. They are ideal for space division, privacy and modern appearance, made of durable materials and adaptable to your needs.

extra.description: Solutions that protect from the sun and improve space comfort.

alubond.title: Alubond Facades
alubond.description: Our company manufactures high-quality Alubond facades that make buildings modern, attractive and energy efficient. Facades are lightweight, durable and available in different colors and decorations, adapted for both residential and commercial buildings.

extra.description: Solutions that protect from the sun and improve space comfort.

velux.title: Roof Windows
velux.description: Our company installs Velux roof windows, known for quality and durability. They are ideal for attics and roof spaces, allowing natural light, ventilation and modern space appearance.

extra.description: Solutions that protect from the sun and improve space comfort.

residential.title: Residential Projects
residential.description: Modern residential buildings and houses with premium PVC and ALU systems that guarantee comfort, energy efficiency and durability.

commercial.title: Commercial Projects
commercial.description: Business facilities and commercial spaces equipped with advanced systems that combine functionality with aesthetics.

industrial.title: Industrial Projects
industrial.description: Specialized solutions for industrial facilities, halls and production plants with focus on functionality and safety.

renovation.title: Renovations and Reconstructions
renovation.description: Complete renovations of existing buildings with modern PVC and ALU systems for improved energy efficiency.

facade.title: Facade Projects
facade.description: Specialized solutions for modern facades that combine aesthetics with functionality and energy efficiency.

cta.title: Ready for your next project?
cta.description: Contact us today and discuss your needs. Our team of experts is ready to help you realize your ideas.
